page.topic: How to add Keyboard Shortcuts to a Tabbed UI Interface
page.description: The Tabbed UI component is a great way to navigate an application. You can assign keyboard shortcuts to buttons in a Tabbed UI that launch components.

discussion.p: Keyboard shortcuts can be defined for the buttons in a Tabbed UI Component. Keyboard shortcuts are useful in a desktop environment for quickly opening a Grid or UX component in a Tabbed UI. Keyboard shortcuts allow the user to open a component without having to locate the button in the Tabbed UI interface. The *[ui:Keyboard shortcut]* property is used to define the keyboard shortcut for a Tabbed UI button.
